title: Amy’s Son Gets Hit At School + Bobby Plays Theater He Couldn’t Afford To Attend As A Child
itunes:title: Amy’s Son Gets Hit At School + Bobby Plays Theater He Couldn’t Afford To Attend As A Child
description:
Amy talks about her son getting slapped at school and his reaction. Bobby talks about the ‘full circle’ moment of doing stand-up at a theater in Little Rock that he couldn’t afford to go to as a child. Also, Amy regrets not making a citizen’s arrest.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
